item.title: Rainbow and Video Virtual Backgrounds
item.description: Several folks have been asking me this: how complex is it to get a virtual background when using Rainbow, just like when using Zoom? Turns out, it’s not all that hard. You basically have two options: You can go down the professional road and film yourself with a green background. There are some great offerings and the best reviewed one by many semi-famous people is the Elgato collpasible chroma key panel.
